bill_title: revise certain provisions that dedicate property tax revenue for the financing of tax incremental districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions that dedicate property tax revenue for the financing of tax incremental districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 11-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding the other provisions of this chapter, any tax incremental district created by a municipality or county after July 1, 2015, shall be funded entirely by the entity creating the district. All other taxing districts shall be held harmless and shall receive the property taxes levied by the taxing district including the incremental increase in the assessed valuation that may have occurred from the creation of the tax incremental district. Any taxing district that is authorized to levy taxes on property in the tax incremental district may participate in the funding of the tax incremental district pursuant to the provisions of this chapter by adopting a resolution dedicating the increased tax revenue to the tax incremental district. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
